meanings.def: the head of the government of a town or city, etc., elected by the public
examples: This is the second time she has run for mayor of St. Louis.
He became the first directly elected mayor of London in 2000.
The allegations were made in an article by former New York mayor, Ed Koch.

meanings.def: (in England, Wales and Northern Ireland) the head of a town, borough or county council, chosen by other members of the council to represent them at official ceremonies, etc.
